MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area this evening and we apologise for this. Our engineers are still on site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:40pm on Saturday, 13 February 2021
